meanings.definition: To kill someone because they refuse to give up their religious or political beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The brave hero was martyred for standing up for what he believed in.
meanings.sent2: The martyr was martyred for refusing to renounce his faith.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character was martyred for always speaking the truth.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation was martyred by the false accusations.
meanings.sent5: The historical figure was martyred for fighting against injustice.

meanings.definition: To make someone suffer in a way that is considered unfair.
meanings.sent1: The unfair treatment martyred his spirit and resolve.
meanings.sent2: The harsh punishment martyred his hopes and dreams.
meanings.sent3: The long line at the store checkout martyred his patience.
meanings.sent4: The difficult exam martyred his confidence in his abilities.
meanings.sent5: The unbearable heat martyred his endurance during the race.

meanings.definition: A person who is killed because of their religious or political beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The martyr is remembered for their unwavering dedication to their beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The community honored the martyr for their sacrifice.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef became a martyr for burning the dinner.
meanings.sent4: The fallen soldier was a martyr for defending his country.
meanings.sent5: The activist became a martyr for advocating for equality.
